mapper.select: select * from sys_user where username = #{username} limit 1
select * from sys_user where id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (username, password, real_name, email, phone, department, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{realName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{department}, #{status}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select * from sys_user order by id desc
select u.* from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id inner join sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.id where r.role_code = #{roleCode} order by u.real_name, u.username
mapper.update: update sys_user set status = #{status}, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
update sys_user set password = #{password}, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
